repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Academy of Management Memorabilia #5289 MB. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5289: Academy of Management. Records, 1942-2000 5289 P: Academy of Management. Photographs. 5289 PUBS: Academy of Management. Publications, 2005. 5289 PUBS(d): AoM. Publications (digital)

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives 227 Ives Hall Tower Road Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheelref@cornell.edu https://catherwood.library.cornell.edu/kheel/

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Zippered briefcases - navy with gold lettering "Academy of Management, New York 1982", "Compliments of : Long Island Universtiy, C.W. Post Center, School of Business"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: White cotton t-shirts, 1 with front lettering--"Eastern Academy of Management, Providence, EAM, '93, Berlin, Paul-Lobe-Institut" and back has picture with lettering "Brandenburger Tor, Berlin"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: White cotton t-shirts, 4 with front lettering--"Hong Kong-Beijing-Portland-1989-EAM, Eastern Academy of Management"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gold and maroon metal lapel pins with scrolled lettering "EAM"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Buttons- white with red lettering - 3 each - "Portland, EAM, 1989, Hong Kong" ; "D.C.-1988, EAM, Hong Kong-1989" ; "Boston, 1987, Athens"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Badge with lettering- " Arthur G Bedeian, Louisiana State Univ. - Academy of Management 1990, Annual Meeting" ; attached purple ribbon with gold lettering "Past President"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: In Recognition of outstanding contributions to the profession of Management by superior research, scholarship and furtherance of this Society and its precepts, hereby bestows upon Karl D. Reyer the Honor of Fellow in the Academy with obligations and responsibilities to maintain the standards of the profession and further its usefulness. December 29, 1937
